description: Ministry of City Planning and Water Supply - Oders made to approve the acquisition of 02 allotments of land in Pitagaldeniya, Galigamuwa D/S Division, Kegalle District for the constructions under the Galigamuwa Water Supply Scheme and of the immovable property in Debarawea, Tissamaharama D/S Division, Hambantota District required by the National Water Supply and Drainage Board to improve the Tissamaharama Water Supply Scheme
